synonyms.synonym: Succinate-ubiquinone oxidoreductase cytochrome B large subunit
SubName: cDNA FLJ57876, highly similar to Homo sapiens succinate dehydrogenase complex, subunit C, transcript variant 2, mRNA
SubName: Succinate dehydrogenase complex, subunit C delta3 alternative splicing variant
SubName: Succinate dehydrogenase complex, subunit C, integral membrane protein, 15kDa, isoform CRA_g

protein.specific_function: Membrane-anchoring subunit of succinate dehydrogenase (SDH) that is involved in complex II of the mitochondrial electron transport chain and is responsible for transferring electrons from succinate to ubiquinone (coenzyme Q).

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors

reference.reference_text: Hirawake H, Taniwaki M, Tamura A, Kojima S, Kita K: Cytochrome b in human complex II (succinate-ubiquinone oxidoreductase): cDNA cloning of the components in liver mitochondria and chromosome assignment of the genes for the large (SDHC) and small (SDHD) subunits to 1q21 and 11q23. Cytogenet Cell Genet. 1997;79(1-2):132-8.
